newsitem.title: USA: Westinghouse Air in 10 mln shr deal w Scandinavia.
newsitem.headline: Westinghouse Air in 10 mln shr deal w Scandinavia.

text.p: Westinghouse Air Brake Co said Tuesday that it on March 31 closed on the previously announced purchase of 10 million of its shares from a major shareholder, Scandinavian Incentive Holdings BV.
The stock was sold to WABCO and an investor group led by Vestar Equity Partners LP. The transaction was conditioned upon approval from its creditors, said the company, and approval has been obtained.
In conjunction with this transaction, WABCO said it obtained a $15 million increase to an existing line of credit under its bank credit agreement.
Westinghouse Air Brake Company is North America's largest manufacturer of value added equipment for locomotives, railway freight cars and passenger transit vehicles.
